Message:
I’ve been thinking of
your kindness, my lord.

If you could see what was
happening in this world,
I have no doubt you would
jump to their aid.

As your secretary,
I cannot possibly turn
my back on them either.

Doing so would be the same
as losing the right to call
myself your secretary.

For the sake of repaying
all those who have taken me
under their wing here...

For the sake of bringing
this world even a little closer
to a brighter future...

And more than anything,
for the sake of continuing
as your prided secretary...

I want to do everything
I can for this world.
